Dear Prof. Goodwin

I installed Cantera and tried to run the examples.
There came the errors:

Procedure: findInputFile
Error:
Input file gri30.xml not found in directories
'.',
'/home/hoa/cantera/data/inputs',
'/usr/local/cantera/data'

To fix this problem, either:
    a) move the missing files into the local directory;
    b) define environment variable CANTERA_DATA to
         point to the directory containing the file.

I checked the data/inputs dir, but there were only gri30.cti and
gri30.inp.

I also set the environmental variable, the CANTERA_ROOT and PATH. But
it didn't work. I could not run the examples out of its directory.

Thanks
Hoa
